nodes.text: The Pii system was an Outer Rim Territories star system in Arkanis sector near the Mid Rim border. It centered around a red giant and contained seven orbiting planets and two separate asteroid belts. The system was sold to a Corulag entrepreneur when preliminary mining expeditions were fruitless, but eventually developed a profitable industry centered around the logging and export of luxury greel wood from the planets Pii III and Pii IV.
